text: Mauritz Sigvard Marjasin (24 November 1929 – 24 January 2021) was a Swedish politician and trade unionist. He was chairman of the Municipal Workers' Union from 1977 to 1988. He also was the Governor of Örebro County from 1989 to 1994. Marjasin died of COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Sweden on 24 January 2021, aged 91.Sigvard Marjasin död i COVID-19 ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Sweden Category:Swedish trade unionists Category:Swedish politicians Category:Örebro County
title: Sigvard Marjasin
